input_parameters.name: canvas_update_type
input_parameters.description: Type of update. Options are `standalone` or `channel_canvas`. Default is `standalone`.

input_parameters.name: channel_id
input_parameters.description: Select a channel in cases when `canvas_update_type` is set to `channel_canvas`.

input_parameters.name: canvas_id
input_parameters.description: Select a canvas in cases when `canvas_update_type` is set to `standalone`.

input_parameters.name: action
input_parameters.description: How do you want to update? Options are `append`, `prepend`, or `replace`. Default is `prepend`.

input_parameters.name: content
input_parameters.description: Content to add to the canvas
